t: So protect your brand with Amazon Brand Registry
s: The online giant will, of course, check whether you meet the criteria to register your Amazon brand: Your brand must be either already registered and active in the national trademark register or at least have a trademark application submitted.

t: Brand Stores: Create a brand page on Amazon for free | Amazon Ads
s: Brand Stores help build brand awareness by showcasing your brand and product catalog on your own Amazon web address. You can create a Brand Store at no additional cost—with no coding necessary.

t: Amazon owns more than 80 private-label brands — see the list
s: October 8, 2018 - Everyone knows Amazon owns brands like AmazonBasics, but there are many more that are less obvious. Some of the private-label brands are even exclusive to Prime members. See some of the brands you didn't realize were owned by Amazon.

t: What is a National Brand: Basics | SendPulse
s: A national brand can be defined as a brand of a well-established product. This company has a name that people love and trust and although the price of such products is usually higher, consumers still don’t stop buying them. You can find national brands everywhere.

t: Big National Brands As Amazon Sellers | Lean Edge Marketing
s: February 10, 2020 - There is a struggle being waged between big national / multinational brands and Amazon. Many big brands are interested in selling their own products on Amazon’s Third Party Marketplace (3P). Amazon does not want this to happen.
